item.title: Chief adviser releases commemorative postage stamp on Victory Day
item.description: Chief Adviser Professor Muhammad Yunus has released a commemorative postage stamp on the occasion of the Great Victory Day. He also released an opening day cover and a canceller at a ceremony at the State Guest House Jamuna in Dhaka on Monday afternoon, said the Chief Adviser’s Press Wing.
